title: City girls
brief_description: Shows a bushwalking and outdoors activities program at the Mittagundy camp on the Bogong High Plains attended by unemployed girls from underprivileged backgrounds and girls of the same age from private school backgrounds. Notes in particular the way in which the girls respond to the various challenges of the camp.
